atk-s0517a18:0_0: It is appropriate to talk to a group of five.
atk-s0517a18:1_0: On the contrary of the Teaching
atk-s0517a18:2_1: Just now, as one who is realized the ultimate end of seclusion, the ultimate sanctuary, the ultimate spiritual life, the ultimate goal, and is well-known, the end of the world—with its gods, Māras and Brahmās, this population with its ascetics and brahmins, its gods and humans—and to live detached, liberated, with a mind free of limits.
atk-s0517a18:2_2: But because of her talk, she discusses with the color of that talk.
atk-s0517a18:3_0: The discussion of the beautiful ones is finished.
